contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 10, 1987 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Invitation Entertainment)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Invitation Entertainment) 0 Entertainments Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £225 and trophy, 2nd £115, 3rd £75. 4 bands competed. 29th annual contest.
Oct. 22, 2014, 10:15 a.m. Feb. 6, 2017, 10:18 a.m.
1 Rhodian Brass Murray Slater
2 Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin
3 Nottingham City Transport Band Colin Toghill
4 Huthwaite Prize Band Unknown
